respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.

$Log: aesch.eum_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2009-10-09 19:49:18 rsingh04 more reorganizing of texts module by collection
Revision 1.1 2009/10/07 20:59:53 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files
Revision 1.3 2005/08/01 15:44:56 packel really removed item tags
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 15:32:41 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:27:02 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.9 2004/04/21 20:28:10 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.8 2003/07/01 22:14:25 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.7 2000/03/04 20:33:49 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.6 2000/02/17 17:46:03 amahoney use n on sp for speeches interrupted by cardbreaks; put cards at ends of such speeches after the close tag; put sp and speaker tags on the divs of the choruses, which were not marked at all (but div2 closes sp, so we lost the speaker info)
Revision 1.5 1999/12/22 22:12:18 amahoney convert to P3

sp.speaker: *puqia/s
sp.l: prw=ton me\n eu)xh=| th=|de presbeu/w qew=n
h(\ dh\ to\ mhtro\s deute/ra to/d' e(/zeto
mantei=on, w(s lo/gos tis: e)n de\ tw=| tri/tw|
la/xei, qelou/shs, ou)de\ pro\s bi/an tino/s,
e)s th/nde gai=an h)=lqe *parnhsou= q' e(/dras.
pe/mpousi d' au)to\n kai\ sebi/zousin me/ga
molo/nta d' au)to\n ka/rta timalfei= lew/s,
te/xnhs de/ nin *zeu\s e)/nqeon kti/sas fre/na
i(/zei te/tarton toi=sde ma/ntin e)n qro/nois:
kai\ nu=n tuxei=n me tw=n pri\n ei)so/dwn makrw=|
manteu/omai ga\r w(s a)\n h(gh=tai qeo/s.
h)= deina\ le/cai, deina\ d' o)fqalmoi=s drakei=n,
pa/lin m' e)/pemyen e)k do/mwn tw=n *loci/ou,
w(s mh/te swkei=n mh/te m' a)ktai/nein ba/sin,
tre/xw de\ xersi/n, ou) podwkei/a| skelw=n:
dei/sasa ga\r grau=s ou)de/n, a)nti/pais me\n ou)=n.
